alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 3:57AM EST until January 16 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Plymouth and Barnstable Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... This already ongoing event will be long fused with up to 4" of snow possible between now and Monday morning. Highest snow totals expected across southern Plymouth and western Barnstable counties, either side of the Cape Cod Canal. The outer Cape is unlikely to meet advisory level snowfall with primarily rain expected from Chatham to Provincetown. Additionally, snow totals are expected to be less in northern Plymouth County.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
